channel.title: chinese on Rumor Theory
channel.description: Recent content in chinese on Rumor Theory

item.title: Corona (NDR): Drosten erklärt extreme Italien-Todeszahlen - und macht Hoffnung
item.description: Coronavirus in Deutschland: Virologe Prof. Christian Drosten gab im NDR-Podcast ein Update zur aktuellen Lage - und macht Hoffnung mit Antigen-Tests. Professor Christian Drosten ist Leiter des Instituts für Virologie an der Charité in Berlin.

item.title: Rammstein singer Till Lindemann in ICU at hospital in Germany [UPDATED]
item.description: Till Lindemann, photo by Jens Koch After a report Friday morning that Rammstein singer TIll Lindemann had tested positive for coronavirus, and was admitted into an intensive care unit at a hospital in Germany, the band has clarified the news.

item.title: Public health experts blast Boris Johnson for ‘slow’ coronavirus response
item.description: The three men leading the United Kingdom’s response to the coronavirus pandemic — Prime Minister Boris Johnson, Health Secretary Matt Hancock and the chief medical officer, Chris Whitty — are doing so from quarantine after coming down with COVID-19 symptoms, and receiving strong criticism for not better protecting themselves from the disease.

item.title: Роскомнадзор заблокировал «Двач» из-за фейков о коронавирусе
item.description: Форум «Двач» оказался под временной блокировкой из-за того, что на нем было опубликовано фейковое сообщение о введении комендантского часа в Москве Нариман Намазов (Фото: Нариман Намазов / VK) Роскомнадзор заблокировал ресурс «Двач» (2ch) из-за фейковой информации о коронавирусе, сообщили РБК в ведомстве.

item.title: Transport and Infrastructure Minister Adil Karaismailoğlu Takes Over
item.description: Minister of Transport and Infrastructure Adil Karaismailoğlu, in his speech at the handover ceremony held at the Ministry, reminded that as of the end of September, he started to work as Deputy Minister of the Ministry of Transport and Infrastructure with the favor of President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan and Minister Cahit Turhan.

item.title: Stimulus Check Calculator: How much money will you get?
item.description: × Stimulus Check Calculator: How much money will you get? DALLAS — New tools developed by prominent websites should help you get a better idea of how much you’ll receive from the government as part of the $2 trillion stimulus package.

item.title: Belgische kat loopt coronavirus op, hoe uitzonderlijk is dat en moeten we ons zorgen maken over onze huisdieren?
item.description: Ja, maar dat is volgens virologen zeer uitzonderlijk. Er zijn wereldwijd momenteel drie gevallen bekend waarbij dieren het coronavirus hadden opgelopen. Het gaat om twee honden in Hongkong en één kat in België.

item.title: TV’de bugün ne var? 28 Mart Kanal D, ATV, Show TV, Star TV, TRT1 tv kanallarının yayın akışı list...
item.description: Bu akşam ekranlarda yayınlanacak olan dizi ve filmlerin yayın akışları belli oldu. Hafta sonu Cumartesi gününü evde geçirecek olan kalabalık aileler dizi ve film keyfi yapmak için 28 Mart tv yayın akışına bakmaya başladı.

item.title: Bad Bunny gets a full drag makeover and twerks with himself in his brand new video
item.description: Puerto Rican trap singer and long time LGBT+ ally Bad Bunny got a full drag makeover and twerked with himself in his new music video. The video for his song ‘Yo Perreo Sola‘ was released on Friday, March 27, and sees the artist, known off-stage as Benito Ocasio, make multiple outfit changes including several incredible drag looks.

item.title: Virus Outbreak: MOE tells schools to heed four rules
item.description: Virus Outbreak: MOE tells schools to heed four rules Staff writer, with CNA As universities and colleges are to begin their new semesters tomorrow, the Ministry of Education (MOE) has ordered schools to follow four key preventive measures against COVID-19.

item.title: 36 milhões de pessoas ainda podem sacar até R$ 998 do FGTS; saiba checar
item.description: Cerca de 37% dos trabalhadores com direito ao saque imediato de até R$ 998 do FGTS (Fundo de Garantia do Tempo de Serviço) ainda não retiraram o dinheiro do fundo, o que equivale a 36 milhões de pessoas.

item.title: La chanson de Vanessa Paradis et Samuel Benchetrit pour les soignants
item.description: MUSIQUE - Des notes de guitare qui s’égrènent. La voix aérienne de Vanessa Paradis. Et une petite mélodie en reconnaissance aux soignants. C’est l’idée qu’ont eue la chanteuse et son mari, Samuel Benchetrit, confinés ensemble.

item.description: Patrice Motsepe and his businesses donated R1 billion to fight Covid-19, the disease caused by the novel coronavirus, in South Africa. This follows a R1 billion donation from each of

item.title: FOTO şi VIDEO: Imnul României a răsunat astăzi pe toate maşinile de Poliţie din ţară
item.description: Imnul României a răsunat de pe toate maşinile de Poliţie din ţară, sâmbătă, începând cu ora 17.00, în semn de mulţumire pentru cei care respectă carantina, anunţă Sindicatul Poliţiştilor Europol.

item.title: Rebecca Sugar Says Good-bye to Steven Universe
item.description: Photo: Courtesy of Cartoon Network Six years after it premiered, Steven Universe is leaving the world of television much better than it found it. Beyond its catchy music, warm, compelling characters, and intricate plotting, the Cartoon Network series has told an important story about one of the biggest themes in children’s media: self-worth.

item.title: Government to publish full list of 'essential services' that can remain open
item.description: The Government is this morning expected to publish a full list of the workers it classes as essential. It comes after the Taoiseach announced a nationwide lockdown until Easter Sunday in a bid to slow the spread of COVID-19.

item.title: Copper boosts pig growth, and now we know why
item.description: Pigs have better feed conversion rates with copper in their diets, but until now, scientists didn’t fully understand why. Existing research from the University of Illinois shows copper doesn’t change fat and energy absorption from the diet.

item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Endonezya’nın başkenti Cakarta’da koronavirüs nedeniyle ilan edilen acil durum uzatıldı Cakarta Valisi Anies Baswedan, Kovid-19’a karşı tedbirler kapsamında 20 Mart’ta ilan edilen iki haftalık acil durumun 19 Nisan’a kadar uzatılması kararı alındığını açıkladı.

item.title: How can Boris Johnson run the UK while suffering from coronavirus?
item.description: London (CNN) When British Prime Minister Boris Johnson announced on Friday morning that he had tested positive for coronavirus, he insisted that he would continue to head up his country’s fight against the pandemic.

item.title: 'Stay home': Varadkar announces sweeping two-week lockdown
item.description: Irish taoiseach says new measures aimed at ‘saving as many people’s lives as possible’ The Irish government has announced sweeping restrictions that will put Ireland in a de facto lockdown to try to slow the spread of coronavirus.

item.title: Le confinement en Belgique prolongé: les réponses à toutes les questions que vous vous posez
item.description: Les mesures de confinement entrées en vigueur le 18 mars dernier seront valables jusqu’au 19 avril, soit le dimanche de fin des vacances de Pâques, a indiqué la Première ministre Sophie Wilmès à l’issue d’un nouveau Conseil national de sécurité.

item.title: Nhạc sĩ Phong Nhã - tác giả ca khúc 'Ai yêu Bác Hồ Chí Minh hơn thiếu niên nhi đồng' qua đời
item.description: Nhạc sĩ Phong Nhã Trên trang cá nhân, họa sĩ Tô Chiêm cho biết: “Nhạc sĩ Phong Nhã, người tổng phụ trách đầu tiên của Đội thiếu niên tiền phong Hồ Chí Minh, đã ra đi hồi 4h08 sáng sớm nay.

item.title: Coronavirus: La reina Isabel II sigue con buena salud, anuncian voceros del palacio de Buckingham
item.description: Cuando se dio a conocer que Boris Johnson había dado positivo por coronavirus, las alertas sobre la salud de la reina Isabel II volvieron a encenderse Redacción Luego de anunciarse que el primer ministro de Reino Unido, Boris Johnson, dio positivo por coronavirus, la salud de la reina Isabel II de Reino Unido ha ocupado titulares de noticias a nivel internacional debido a que su hijo, el príncipe heredero Carlos de Gales también fue diagnosticado con Covid-19.

item.title: Как прошла четвертая церемония роз проекта Холостяк-10 и кто покинул шоу
item.description: 27 марта на телеканале СТБ вышел четвертый выпуск десятого сезона романтического реалити “Холостяк”, который прошел в Таиланде. На этой неделе проект покинула одна участница. Церемония роз выдалась очень волнительной для многих девушек, однако почти все участницы получили свой заветный цветок.

item.description: Dr. Robert Breiman is an MD and a professor of Global Health and Infectious Diseases at Emory University. He was previously based in Bangladesh and Kenya with the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention and led investigations and response to a number of major outbreaks.

item.description: واستطاع جيف بيزوس الرئيس التنفيذي لشركة أمازون، والرجل الأغنى في العالم، من تحقيق مكسب كبير رغم انهيار السوق الأمريكي، وذلك بعد نجاحه في بيع وشراء الأسهم الأمريكية بتوقيت صحيح. وذكرت صحيفة “جارديان” البريطانية، أن جيف بيزوس حقق أبراحًا وصلت لـ5.

item.title: A Sewing Army, Making Masks for America
item.description: In the meantime, some of the void is being filled by legions of sewers, called to duty in a matter of days via social media and word of mouth, their skills no longer taken for granted or dismissed as a mere hobby.

item.title: Bağışıklık sistemini güçlendirmek için ne yapmalıyız? İşte bağışıklık sistemini güçlendirici şeyler
item.description: Tüm dünyada etkisi sürdüren corona virüs salgınına karşı önlemler alınmaya devam ediyor. Uzmanlar en önemli önlemin bağışıklık sistemini güçlendirmek olduğunu savundu. Vatandaşlar bağışıklık sistemini güçlendirici şeyleri araştırmaya başladı. İşte bağışıklık sistemini güçlendirmenin yolları…

item.title: Lotofácil: aposta única leva prêmio de mais de R$ 1,2 milhão; veja números
item.description: A Lotofácil teve uma aposta única acertadora das 15 dezenas do concurso 1946, realizado na noite de hoje em São Paulo. Os números sorteados foram 01-02-03-04-06-07-10-11-13-14-15-20-21-22-23. O prêmio que será pago ao bilhete vencedor é de R$ 1.

item.title: To fish or not to fish - that is the question
item.description: Covid-19 To fish or not to fish - that is the question Jim Kayes tests the waters of social media to see how people are coping with being told to avoid their favourite pastime.

item.title: ראש ממשלת בריטניה בוריס ג'ונסון נדבק בקורונה
item.description: בבריטניה דיווחו היום (שישי) כי ראש ממשלת בריטניה, בוריס ג'ונסון, נמצא חיובי לנגיף הקורונה. ג'ונסון בן ה-55, נכנס לבידוד מיידי של 14 יום, וימשיך לנהל מרחוק את המשבר שהתפתח במדינה בעקבות התפרצות הנגיף.

item.title: Nouvelle attestation de déplacement dérogatoire : téléchargez la nouvelle version, les infos pratiques
item.description: ATTESTATION DE SORTIE. Envie de sortir faire un tour ? Besoin de faire quelques courses ? En temps de confinement, c’est encore possible, à condition néanmoins de se munir d’une attestation de déplacement dérogatoire.

item.title: Fame MMA 6 odbędzie się mimo pandemii! Gdzie i o której obejrzeć galę? Sport
item.description: Władze organizacji Fame MMA zapewniają, że sobotnia gala dojdzie do skutku. Z uwagi na pandemię koronawirusa organizatorzy już jakiś czas temu zrezygnowali z udziału kibiców w tym wydarzeniu. Organizacja zdecydowała się zmienić charakter swojej gali na typowo telewizyjne show, które będzie można zobaczyć w systemie pay-per-view.

item.title: Koronavírus: van egy anyag, ami hatékonynak tűnik a betegség kezelésében
item.description: A kezdeti eredmények szerint a hidroxi-klorokin-szulfát más gyógyszerekkel együtt alkalmazva hatékonynak mutatkozik a koronavírusos betegek kezelésében. Erről Pallos László, az Alkaloida Zrt. beszerzési és logisztikai igazgatója és Szentiványi Mátyás, az Országos Gyógyszerészeti és Élelmezés-egészségügyi Intézet (OGYÉI) főigazgatója beszélt pénteken a Kossuth rádió Jó reggelt, Magyarország!

item.title: Ajax footballer Abdelhak Nouri awakes from coma after 32 months
item.description: Abdelhak Nouri, a midfielder for Dutch football giants Ajax, has woken from a coma after two years, eight months and 19 days. The player’s brother Abderrahim said the 22-year-old woke up and showed signs of life, Dutch daily De Telegraaf reported late on Thursday.

item.title: Trump slams Gov. Gretchen 'Half Whitmer' in new tweet over medical supplies
item.description: The war of words between President Donald Trump and Gov. Gretchen Whitmer has taken another turn. Trump blasted Whitmer in a tweet Friday night - one day after Whitmer had called him out about medical supplies for the state of Michigan.

item.title: Kollywood Mourns Demise Of 'Kanna Laddu Thinna Aasaiya' Actor Sethuraman
item.description: Well-known Tamil actor and dermatologist Sethuraman’s untimely demise has left the entire Kollywood industry into a state of shock and grief. The actor breathed his last on March 26, 2020, on Thursday in Chennai.

item.title: Integrante de Morat tiene coronavirus; todos los miembros se sometieron a cuarentena
item.description: A través de redes sociales, la banda colombiana Morat informó que uno de sus miembros dio positivo para COVID-19, por lo que decidieron someterse todos a cuarentena. El cuarteto está integrado por Juan Pablo Isaza, Simón Vargas, Juan Pablo Villamil y Martín Vargas.

item.title: Myer workers stood down as stores shut
item.description: Staff at Myer stores in Geelong and Werribee will be stood down as the retail giant shuts all of it’s stores for a month amid the Coronavirus pandemic. The retail giant will close all stores around the country from the close of business on Sunday for an initial four week period however all online business will continue to operate.

item.title: Агата Муцениеце раскрыла причину развода с Павлом Прилучным
item.description: МОСКВА, 25 мар — РИА Новости. Актриса и телеведущая Агата Муцениеце рассказала в интервью с Лаурой Джугелия о причинах развода с Павлом Прилучным. Видео беседы было Актриса и телеведущая Агата Муцениеце рассказала в интервью с Лаурой Джугелия о причинах развода с Павлом Прилучным.

item.title: Aruba, HPE Launch Solutions To Connect Telco 5G, Enterprise Wi-Fi
item.description: Aruba and Hewlett Packard Enterprise are helping enterprises harness both 5G and Wi-Fi 6 technologies for the most seamless and easy connections, with less management for IT. Aruba on Tuesday launched a new roaming service called Aruba Air Pass that lets cellular users securely and automatically connect onto Aruba enterprise Wi-Fi networks.

item.title: Coronavirus: Pregnant Carrie Symonds self-isolating after Boris Johnson tests positive for virus
item.description: Boris Johnson’s pregnant fiancee Carrie Symonds has been self-isolating separately from the Prime Minister for more than a week, according to reports. Symonds, who is around six months pregnant, reportedly left Downing Street at least 10 days ago and is believed to be at the couple’s home in south London.

item.title: Savaş Vadisi filmin konusu ne, oyuncuları kim? Savaş Vadisi konusu ve oyuncu kadrosu
item.description: Bu akşam ekrana gelecek olan Savaş Vadisi filmi için geri sayım başladı. Dram ve savaş türündeki filmde Desmond T. Doss’un tek bir kurşun bile sıkmadan 75 askeri kurtarmasını anlatan gerçek olaylardan esinlenilmiştir.

item.title: Hotel Tequendama servirá como centro 'semihospitalario' para atender pacientes con covid-19
item.description: A dos días de entrar en vigencia la cuarentena nacional, el presidente Iván Duque informó que el Hotel Tequendama, ubicado en el centro de Bogotá, será adecuado para dar atención médica a los pacientes contagiados por coronavirus.

item.title: How Will Black Widow's Delay Impact The MCU's Future?
item.description: With all these delays and more movies still on the calendar for later in the summer, Disney might not want to place Black Widow among them. Plus, the studio has also delayed Mulan, which is another big-budget release that Disney wants to be a blockbuster just as much as Black Widow.

item.title: Liquidators appointed to four USIT travel group firms
item.description: Provisional liquidators have been appointed to four companies in the USIT student travel group, after the Covid-19 crisis caused their collapse. The companies employed 149 people. The High Court was told that many spring and summer travel bookings as well as tours for students and school groups have been cancelled and new bookings have collapsed.

item.title: NoHo Partners Plc’s Board of Directors cancels its profit distribution proposal
item.description: NoHo Partners Plc INSIDE INFORMATION 26 March 2020 at 22:30 NoHo Partners Plc’s Board of Directors cancels its profit distribution proposal Due to the fast-changing coronavirus pandemic and the general financial uncertainty it causes, NoHo Partners Plc’s Board of Directors has today decided to cancel the profit distribution proposal of EUR 0.

item.title: US coronavirus cases reach more than 101,000 as reported deaths hit new daily high
item.description: (CNN) The number of confirmed coronavirus cases in the United States topped 101,000 on Friday as infections quickly spread to new areas of the country. As of Friday evening, the US has at least 101,242 known cases of coronavirus and 1,588 people have died , according to CNN’s tally of cases reported by health officials.

item.title: Boris Johnson and Carrie Symonds
item.description: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson said Friday he has tested positive for the new coronavirus, but remains in charge of the U.K.‘s response to the outbreak. (adsbygoogle = window.

item.title: GMB viewers in hysterics after Edwina Currie's husband unknowingly appears in interview
item.description: Good Morning Britain viewers were left in hysterics after Edwina Currie’s husband accidentally upstaged her video interview on the show this morning. The former politician, 73, from Derbyshire, appeared on the show this morning to speak about her new show ‘Pilgrimage: The Road to Istanbul’.

item.title: YKS konuları neler? 12. sınıf müfredatı belli oldu!
item.description: 25-26 Temmuz’da yapılacak YKS sınavlar öncesinde öğrenciler sınavlara evden hazırlanırken, Milli Eğitim Bakanlığı’ndan (MEB) YKS ile ilgili açıklama yapıldı. YKS sınavına girecek öğrencilerin 9, 10, 11’inci sınıf müfredatına ek olarak 12’nci sınıfın sadece birinci döneminden sorumlu olacağı bildirildi.

item.title: In West African Coronavirus Hotspot, War Has Left 700,000 Homeless and Exposed
item.description: On March 18, Burkina Faso suffered the first confirmed Covid-19 fatality in all of sub-Saharan Africa. The victim was Rose-Marie Compaoré, the first vice president of the Sahelian nation’s parliament. Tiny, impoverished, and conflict-scarred, Burkina Faso is now West Africa’s worst-affected country, with 146 confirmed cases, including four government ministers.

item.title: Star Trek: Picard is the dark reboot that boldly goes where nobody wanted it to
item.description: Trek used to be a vision of an optimistic future, but there is a world of difference between the Amazon reboot and previous adventures of the Enterprise It is the year 2364, and Jean-Luc Picard – the revered captain of the USS Enterprise – has just come face to face with three humans who have been frozen in time since the late 20th century.

item.description: كتب محمد رضا توفى الممثل الأمريكى العالمى مارك بلوم، من مضاعفات إصابته بالفيروسات التاجية كورونا المستجد “كوفيد 19”، والذى رحل عن يناهز 69 عامًا، وقد كان بلوم معروفًا بمشاركته فى أفلام مثل “Desperately Seeking Susan” و"“Crocodile Dundee، بالإضافة إلى مجموعة من مسرحيات Broadway والإنتاج المسرحى والأعمال التلفزيونية.

item.title: Clocks Change 2020: EU voted to SCRAP daylight saving time - why? Is this the last BST?
item.description: The clock change will happen in the UK on Sunday, March 29, meaning the country will lose one hour during its first lockdown weekend. The European Union voted to scrap the practice of moving clocks two years after the concept was proposed.

item.title: Pearl Jam: Gigaton
item.description: Before they had anything—a legion of devoted fans, walls of platinum records, a destination festival—Pearl Jam had a community. In the Seattle grunge scene of the early ’90s, they emerged as part of a larger mosaic, members of a supergroup before their debut even came out.

item.title: Fish on
item.description: Seizing the opportunity to fish the freshly exposed lakes now void of ice can reap rewards only known to the savviest fishermen. While many often wait to fish for panfish until the bluegills and sunfish to make their beds, typically at the beginning of June, there is a miraculous time right after the ice has retreated and before the lily pads consume the perimeter of the lakes.

item.title: Bank of Canada lowers overnight rate target to ¼ percent
item.description: The Bank of Canada today lowered its target for the overnight rate by 50 basis points to ¼ percent. The Bank Rate is correspondingly ½ percent and the deposit rate is ¼ percent.

item.title: Επίδομα 600 ευρώ: Οι 6 κλάδοι επαγγελματιών που το δικαιούνται
item.description: Δικηγόροι, μηχανικοί, γιατροί, λογιστές, εκπαιδευτικοί και ερευνητές αναμένεται να λάβουν το επίδομα των 600 ευρώ στο πλαίσιο μέτρων στήριξης λόγω του κορωνοϊού. Τα νέα μέτρα, σύμφωνα με τον υπουργό Οικονομικών, Χρήστο Σταϊκούρα, αφορούν κλάδους που δεν δικαιούνται το επίδομα των 800 ευρώ, στο πλαίσιο της δέσμης μέτρων στήριξης λόγω της πανδημίας του κορωνοϊού.

item.title: Αυλαία στο Sport24 Radio - Τον ακολούθησε ο Legend - Η επόμενη κίνηση του Δημήτρη Μάρη

item.title: Alleged Nicolas Maduro co-conspirator is in US custody: Report
item.description: A retired Venezuelan army general indicted alongside Nicolas Maduro has surrendered in Colombia and is being taken by Drug Enforcement Administration agents to New York for arraignment, four people familiar with the situation told the Associated Press on Friday.

item.title: بعد 30 وفاة و536 إصابة.. ما موعد دخول مصر بذروة فيروس كورونا؟ وزيرة الصحة تجيب
item.description: دبي، الإمارات العربية المتحدة (CNN)— ارتفع عدد الإصابات التي سجلتها السلطات المصرية بفيروس كورونا الجديد أو ما بات يُعرف باسم “كوفيد-19” إلى 536 إصابة، حتى مساء الجمعة، مع تسجيل 30 حالة وفاة، وفقا لخالد مجاهد، المتحدث الرسمي لوزارة الصحة المصرية.

item.title: Zadic: „Wegweisungen auch während Quarantäne“
item.description: Außerdem rechnet Zadic mit einem Anstieg von häuslicher Gewalt, da viele Familien jetzt die meiste Zeit auf engem Raum leben müssen: „Ich bin hier in engem Kontakt mit dem Innenminister. Hier sei klargestellt, dass die Quarantäne kein rechtsfreier Raum ist und Wegweisungen durch die Polizei werden in dieser Zeit, wenn nötig, genauso durchgeführt.

item.title: Coronavirus: Simon Harris answers children's questions
item.description: Minister Simon Harris spoke with children in Ireland about their questions and concerns about coronavirus. Ireland’s Minister for Health Simon Harris appeared on RTÉ news2day on March 27 to address some concerns facing Ireland’s youth in the midst of the pandemic.

item.title: Crowds Take To Manly Beach Ignoring Government Regulations

item.title: Italy’s lockdown has been a recipe for disaster
item.description: More than 80,000 people in Italy are known to be infected with Covid-19 and 8,215 have died from it – nearly twice as many as any other country. Yet despite this dreadful outcome, in a video conference of G7 foreign ministers on 25 March Italy’s foreign minister, Luigi Di Maio, boasted about Italy’s lockdown model.
